properties.description: Please input a folder path as the parameter for this pipeline, and the pipeline will delete files which were last modified more than 30 days ago under the particular folder path.

activities.name: DeleteFiles
activities.description: Connect to your storage account to save the log file.

scriptLines: Address as (State as string, Country as string),
disjoint: false) ~> split1@(CseEmployees, CivilEmployees, ItEmployees, Others)
